title: Bug via Web Form
description:
**Bug reported via web form**

**Reporter:** Christopher Michael Dobbins

**Description:**
Requests separate tabs on bug monitor for open and closed tickets, with explanations when tickets are closed

**Submitted:** 2025-10-29
fix_description: Added three tabs to bugs-live.html: ALL, OPEN, CLOSED. Each tab shows live counts and filters bugs accordingly. Tab styling with green/red color coding for bug states. Deployed to production.
